name: Knight vs. Ninja
description:
This is my first game and it is still in development. I will add more abilities and characters in the fautures.

This game is about 2D arena fighting (for now just 2 characters), where the Knight has a melee combat system and the Ninja the ranged one. They have both 2 abilities, which have cooldowns.

Knight:

Q: Rush Left

E: Rush Right

R = Melee Attack

Njinja:

P = Frost ball that slows enemy and deals normal damage
O = Fire ball that knockbacks the enemy and deals massive damage
